  • Method Details

    • updatePlayable

      public void updatePlayable​(HandCard currentCard)
      The colourful Special Cards can be played on any card. The coloured Special Cards can only be played on said colour or symbol
      Overrides:
      updatePlayable in class HandCard
      Parameters:
      currentCard - the current card
